caption.p: qRT-PCR of the expression of INT1 gene of C. albicans exposed to different concentrations of essential oil of B. morelensis, α-Pinene and γ-Terpinene. * Significant differences exist regarding the group of B. morelensis MIC 25 ( p < 0.05). ∞ Significant differences exist regarding the group of B. morelensis MIC 12.5 ( p < 0.05).
